basic_information.committee_name: CMS - Mathematics and Statistics Scholarship Commi

description: Scholarship Mission: To provide scholarship assistance to the students within the College of Mathematics and Science pursuing a degree in the Department of Chemistry in honor of Gabi Rodriguez-Warner. Eligibility Requirements Undergraduate student Must be enrolled full-time Minimum of 2.5 GPA Must be a Chemistry or Mathematics major, preference to a Junior or Senior

general_criteria.description: Soft requirements that provide additional points/consideration

criteria.description: SIS_Classification is Junior   and SIS_Classification is Senior
criteria.raw_text: SIS_Classification is Junior   and SIS_Classification is Senior
criteria.clean_description: Classification: Junior   and SIS_Classification is Senior

hard_criteria.description: Hard requirements that must be met to qualify for the scholarship

criteria.description: Complete Application: "UCO Foundation Qualifying Scholarship Application"
